Package index

All functions

DiagnoDating
DiagnoDating: diagnostics for dated phylogenies in microbial population genetics
calcLikBranches()
Calculate likelihood of branches
calcResiduals()
Calculate normal residuals of branches
estimAlpha()
Estimation of the coalescent rate alpha
plot(<resDating>)
Plotting methods
plotLikBranches()
Plot likelihood of branches
plotResid()
Plot residuals
postdistpvals()
Compute posterior distribution of p-values
ppcheck()
Perform posterior predictive check
print(<resDating>)
Print function for resDating objects
resDating()
Constructor for the class resDating
resample()
Resample a dated tree using bactdate
runBactDating()
Date a tree using BactDating
runDating()
Run a dating analysis
runLSD()
Date a tree using LSD
runNodeDating()
Date a tree using node.dating
runTreeDater()
Date a tree using treedater
runTreeTime()
Date a tree using TreeTime
simMaster()
Simulation with structure using Master
simStructure()
Simulation with structure
takeSample()
Extract from BactDating output (r) the tree corresponding to a specific iteration in (w)
testImbalance()
Test to determine whether there are lineages with unbalanced dates For each node, perform a Kruskal-Wallis test for the dates on the left and on the right
testResid()
Test on residuals
